verses.verse: וַתִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> vat-tis-Sa lifted me up אֹתִ֜י <WH853> 'o-Ti ר֗וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach, Moreover the spirit וַתָּבֵ֣א <WH935> vat-ta-Ve and brought אֹ֠תִי <WH853> 'O-ti אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about שַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- house יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD'S הַקַּדְמוֹנִי֙ <WH6931> hak-kad-mo-Ni me unto the east הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <WH6437> hap-po-Neh which looketh קָדִ֔ימָה <WH6921> ka-Di-mah, eastward וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold בְּפֶ֣תַח <WH6607> be-Fe-tach and behold at the door הַשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> hash-Sha-'ar, of the gate עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim and twenty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <WH2568> va-cha-mish-Shah five אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish; men וָאֶרְאֶ֨ה <WH7200> va-'er-'Eh whom I saw בְתוֹכָ֜ם <WH8432> ve-to-Cham among אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יַאֲזַנְיָ֧ה <WH2970> ya-'a-zan-Yah Jaazaniah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son עַזֻּ֛ר <WH5809> 'az-Zur of Azur וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et פְּלַטְיָ֥הוּ <WH6410> pe-lat-Ya-hu and Pelatiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son בְּנָיָ֖הוּ <WH1141> be-na-Ya-hu of Benaiah שָׂרֵ֖י <WH8269> sa-Rei princes הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> ha-'Am. of the people פ Peh

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלָ֑י <WH413> 'e-Lai; to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- he unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these הָאֲנָשִׁ֞ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim are the men הַחֹשְׁבִ֥ים <WH2803> ha-cho-she-Vim that devise אָ֛וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven mischief וְהַיֹּעֲצִ֥ים <WH3289> ve-hai-yo-'a-Tzim and give עֲצַת־ <WH6098> 'a-tzat- counsel רָ֖ע <WH7451> ra' wicked בָּעִ֥יר <WH5892> ba-'Ir in this city הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> haz-Zot. who

הָאֹ֣מְרִ֔ים <WH559> ha-'O-me-Rim, Which say לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo is not בְקָר֖וֹב <WH7138> ve-ka-Rov [It is] not near בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1129> be-Not let us build בָּתִּ֑ים <WH1004> bat-Tim; houses הִ֣יא <WH1931> hi he הַסִּ֔יר <WH5518> has-Sir, this [city is] the caldron וַאֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> va-'a-Nach-nu we הַבָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> hab-ba-Sar. and we [be] the flesh

לָכֵ֖ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve Therefore prophesy עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem; against הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve against them prophesy בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- O son אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> 'a-Dam. of man

וַתִּפֹּ֣ל <WH5307> vat-tip-Pol fell עָלַי֮ <WH5921> 'a-Lai Then ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach And the Spirit יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer upon me and said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me אֱמֹר֙ <WH559> 'e-Mor unto me Speak כֹּה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> ken So אֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> 'a-mar-Tem Thus have ye said בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וּמַעֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> u-ma-'a-Lot the things that come רֽוּחֲכֶ֖ם <WH7307> ru-cha-Chem into your mind אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְדַעְתִּֽיהָ׃ <WH3045> ye-da'-Ti-ha. for I know

הִרְבֵּיתֶ֥ם <WH7235> hir-bei-Tem Ye have multiplied חַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH2491> chal-lei-Chem your slain בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> ba-'Ir in this city הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> haz-Zot; likewise וּמִלֵּאתֶ֥ם <WH4390> u-mil-le-Tem and ye have filled חוּצֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH2351> chu-tzo-Tei-ha the streets חָלָֽל׃ <WH2491> cha-Lal. thereof with the slain פ Peh

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD חַלְלֵיכֶם֙ <WH2491> chal-lei-Chem Your slain אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom שַׂמְתֶּ֣ם <WH7760> sam-Tem whom ye have laid בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> be-to-Chah, in the midst הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah of the city הַבָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> hab-ba-Sar of it they [are] the flesh וְהִ֣יא <WH1931> ve-Hi and this הַסִּ֑יר <WH5518> has-Sir; and this [city is] the caldron וְאֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> ve-'et-Chem הוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> ho-Tzi but I will bring you forth מִתּוֹכָֽהּ׃ <WH8432> mit-to-Chah. out of the midst

חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev the sword יְרֵאתֶ֑ם <WH3372> ye-re-Tem; Ye have feared וְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> ve-Che-rev a sword אָבִ֣יא <WH935> 'a-Vi and I will bring עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem, and נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um upon you saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. GOD

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֤י <WH3318> ve-ho-tze-Ti And I will bring you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> 'et-Chem מִתּוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> mit-to-Chah, of the midst וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti thereof and deliver אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- you into the hands זָרִ֑ים <WH2114> za-Rim; of strangers וְעָשִׂ֛יתִי <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ti and will execute בָכֶ֖ם va-Chem שְׁפָטִֽים׃ <WH8201> she-fa-Tim. judgments

בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> ba-Che-rev by the sword תִּפֹּ֔לוּ <WH5307> tip-Po-lu, Ye shall fall עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul you in the border יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶשְׁפּ֣וֹט <WH8199> esh-Pot I will judge אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> 'et-Chem; וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

הִ֗יא <WH1931> Hi, This לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh become לָכֶם֙ la-Chem לְסִ֔יר <WH5518> le-Sir, This [city] shall not be your caldron וְאַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem you תִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> tih-Yu become בְתוֹכָ֖הּ <WH8432> ve-to-Chah in the midst לְבָשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> le-va-Sar; neither shall ye be the flesh אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul you in the border יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> 'esh-Pot thereof [but] I will judge אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> 'et-Chem.

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem And ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, that I [am] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher my בְּחֻקַּי֙ <WH2706> be-chuk-Kai in my statutes לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor הֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <WH1980> ha-lach-Tem, for ye have not walked וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> u-mish-pa-Tai my judgments לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <WH6213> 'a-si-Tem; neither executed וּֽכְמִשְׁפְּטֵ֧י <WH4941> u-che-mish-pe-Tei after the manners הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim of the heathen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5439> se-vi-vo-tei-Chem that [are] round about עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <WH6213> 'a-si-Tem. but have done

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi came כְּהִנָּ֣בְאִ֔י <WH5012> ke-hin-Na-ve-'I, And it came to pass when I prophesied וּפְלַטְיָ֥הוּ <WH6410> u-fe-lat-Ya-hu that Pelatiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son בְּנָיָ֖ה <WH1141> be-na-Yah of Benaiah מֵ֑ת <WH4191> Met; died וָאֶפֹּ֨ל <WH5307> va-'ep-Pol Then fell I down עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on פָּנַ֜י <WH6440> pa-Nai upon my face וָאֶזְעַ֣ק <WH2199> va-'ez-'Ak and cried קוֹל־ <WH6963> kol- voice גָּד֗וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol, with a loud וָאֹמַר֙ <WH559> va-'o-Mar and said אֲהָהּ֙ <WH162> 'a-Hah Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD כָּלָה֙ <WH3617> ka-Lah a full end אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah will You עֹשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh, wilt thou make אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> she-'e-Rit of the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man אַחֶ֤יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chei-cha thy brethren אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> 'a-Chei-cha [even] thy brethren אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> 'an-Shei the men גְאֻלָּתֶ֔ךָ <WH1353> ge-'ul-la-Te-cha, of thy kindred וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and the whole בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel כֻּלֹּ֑ה <WH3605> kul-Loh; all אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher whom אָמְר֨וּ <WH559> 'a-me-Ru have said לָהֶ֜ם la-Hem יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei wholly [are] they unto whom the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem רַֽחֲקוּ֙ <WH7368> ra-cha-Ku Get you far מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> me-'Al from יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, from the LORD לָ֥נוּ <WH99999> La-nu הִ֛יא <WH1931> hi this נִתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> nit-te-Nah given הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz unto us is this land לְמוֹרָשָֽׁה׃ <WH4181> le-mo-ra-Shah. in possession ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore אֱמֹ֗ר <WH559> 'e-Mor, Therefore say כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki Though הִרְחַקְתִּים֙ <WH7368> hir-chak-Tim Although I have cast them far off בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> bag-go-Yim, among the heathen וְכִ֥י <WH3588> ve-Chi and though הֲפִֽיצוֹתִ֖ים <WH6327> ha-fi-tzo-Tim and although I have scattered בָּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> ba-'a-ra-Tzot; them among the countries וָאֱהִ֤י <WH1961> va-'e-Hi become לָהֶם֙ la-Hem לְמִקְדָּ֣שׁ <WH4720> le-mik-Dash sanctuary מְעַ֔ט <WH4592> me-'At, yet will I be to them as a little בָּאֲרָצ֖וֹת <WH776> ba-'a-ra-Tzot in the countries אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- where בָּ֥אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u where they shall come שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham. in it ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore אֱמֹ֗ר <WH559> 'e-Mor, Therefore say כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3068> Yah-weh GOD וְקִבַּצְתִּ֤י <WH6908> ve-kib-batz-Ti I will even gather אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> 'et-Chem מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim, you from the people וְאָסַפְתִּ֣י <WH622> ve-'a-saf-Ti and assemble אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> 'et-Chem, מִן־ <WH4480> min- out הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> ha-'a-ra-Tzot, you out of the countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נְפֹצוֹתֶ֖ם <WH6327> ne-fo-tzo-Tem where ye have been scattered בָּהֶ֑ם <WH99999> ba-Hem; וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti and I will give לָכֶ֖ם <WH99999> la-Chem אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> 'ad-Mat you the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וּבָ֖אוּ־ <WH935> u-Va-'u- And they shall come שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> Sham-mah; there וְהֵסִ֜ירוּ <WH5493> ve-he-Si-ru thither and they shall take away אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all שִׁקּוּצֶ֛יהָ <WH8251> shik-ku-Tzei-ha all the detestable things וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all תּוֹעֲבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH8441> to-'a-vo-Tei-ha thereof and all the abominations מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-nah. and I

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will give לָהֶם֙ la-Hem לֵ֣ב <WH3820> lev heart אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, them one וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> ve-Ru-ach spirit חֲדָשָׁ֖ה <WH2319> cha-da-Shah a new אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> 'et-Ten and I will put בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <WH7130> be-kir-be-Chem; within וַהֲסִ֨רֹתִ֜י <WH5493> va-ha-Si-ro-Ti you and I will take לֵ֤ב <WH3820> lev heart הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <WH68> ha-'E-ven the stony מִבְּשָׂרָ֔ם <WH1320> mib-be-sa-Ram, out of their flesh וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti and will give לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לֵ֥ב <WH3820> lev them an heart בָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> ba-Sar. of flesh

לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because of בְּחֻקֹּתַ֣י <WH2708> be-chuk-ko-Tai in my statutes יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> ye-Le-chu, may walk וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִשְׁפָּטַ֥י <WH4941> mish-pa-Tai mine ordinances יִשְׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> yish-me-Ru and keep וְעָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> ve-'a-Su and do אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> 'o-Tam; וְהָיוּ־ <WH1961> ve-ha-yu- become לִ֣י li לְעָ֔ם <WH5971> le-'Am, them and they shall be my people וַאֲנִ֕י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> 'eh-Yeh become לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> le-lo-Him. and I will be their God

וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about לֵ֧ב <WH3820> lev But [as for them] whose heart שִׁקּוּצֵיהֶ֛ם <WH8251> shik-ku-tzei-Hem of their detestable things וְתוֹעֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8441> ve-to-'a-vo-tei-Hem and their abominations לִבָּ֣ם <WH3820> lib-Bam after the heart הֹלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> ho-Lech; walketh דַּרְכָּם֙ <WH1870> dar-Kam their way בְּרֹאשָׁ֣ם <WH7218> be-ro-Sham upon their own heads נָתַ֔תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti, I will recompense נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. GOD
